ModMetaData.name: Name
ModMetaData.author: The Dynamic Trio, CTH2004, SuperEngie, DopeUnicorn909
ModMetaData.description:
The Mod Description FAQ Q: CE Compatible? A: Uh... sure. There might be "unintented features" that we can't guarentee to fix, but you do you and all!
Q: What does this mod do? A: Not much. Mostly just to centrilize the mods made by The Dynamic Trio, and contain shared code when needed, to prevent needing to double up on dependencies and such.
